WFAPI::MapObjectInterface

WFAPI::MapObjectInterface Class Reference

virtual void removeSelectedMapObjectListener (SelectedMapObjectListener *listener)=0

Detailed Description

Interface for adding / removing listener for receiving updates when map objects have been selected.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

virtual WFAPI::MapObjectInterface::~MapObjectInterface (  )  [inline, virtual]

Destructor.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void WFAPI::MapObjectInterface::addSelectedMapObjectListener ( SelectedMapObjectListener *  listener  )  [pure virtual]

Add a SelectedMapObjectListener. This listener will receive a callback when a map object has been selected on the map (for instance because it's clicked).

Parameters:
listener The listener to add.

virtual void WFAPI::MapObjectInterface::removeSelectedMapObjectListener ( SelectedMapObjectListener *  listener  )  [pure virtual]

Remove a SelectedMapObjectListener.

Parameters:
listener The listener to remove.
